name: I wanna be the Dude!
description:
"I wanna be the Dude!" is an action-packed IWBTG Fangame inspired by the OG IWBTG and some early fangames

"Not The Dude" wants to be "The Dude".  In order to do so, he must defeat like 2 bosses and then go to the dude's place I guess.

Contains:

  • 3 Difficult Levels and Bosses
  • Plenty of tight platforming and traps
  • Third Thing
  • A hub world

and much more!

CONTROLS:

Shift to jump and double jump

Z to shoot

R to restart

Q to ???

Esc to quit the game

F2 to go back to the main menu

This is my first full fangame made with GMS2, I hope you enjoy it!
